snippet: Barclays has increased its stake in its South African subsidiary, the Absa Group, in a deal worth $2.1 billion as it moves to consolidate its operations across Africa.
abstract: Barclays has increased its stake in its South African subsidiary, the Absa Group, in a deal worth $2.1 billion as it moves to consolidate its operations across Africa.

headline.main: Barclays Increases Stake in Absa Group in $2.1 Billion Deal
